user.title: Connect to SEMS Portal
user.description: Enter your SEMS Portal credentials to connect your GoodWe solar inverter.

init.title: SEMS Options
init.description: Configure polling and optimization settings for your solar inverter.

data_description.api_server: Select SEMS API server region. Use Auto-detect unless you have connection issues.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the API for new data (30-300 seconds)
data_description.night_mode: Reduce API calls when inverter is offline or not producing power
data_description.night_interval: How often to fetch detailed data during night mode (less frequent saves API calls)
data_description.always_poll_powerflow: Keep polling powerflow at normal rate during night, only slow detailed data fetches
data_description.midnight_skip: Skip API calls between 23:55-00:10 to avoid phantom/incorrect data around midnight
data_description.stale_threshold: Log warning if data hasn't been updated within this time period
